original_text: And under the borders were four wheels; and the axletrees of the wheels were joined to the base: and the height of a wheel was a cubit and half a cubit.
korean_text: 네 바퀴는 옆판 밑에 있고 바퀴 축은 받침 수레에 연결되었는데 바퀴의 높이는 각각 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And under the borders were four wheels;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 테두리 아래에는 네 개의 바퀴가 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the axletrees of the wheels were joined to the base:
and the height of a wheel was a cubit
